item.description: That k8s can run “init containers” before a pod’s app containers: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/pods/init-containers/. This provides setup-script functionality, and Cloudflare Pages uses multiple init containers for cloning, installing toolchains, and building pages: https://blog.cloudflare.com/moderizing-cloudflare-pages-builds-toolbox/#our-modular-and-scalable-architecture
